note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Share of adults who are obese vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Obesity is defined as having a body-mass index (BMI) â‰¥ 30. BMI is a person's weight (in kilograms) divided by their height (in meters) squared. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
